comment: Extremely unclear grading instructions, to the point where you have to heavily rely on other students to have any idea what she's asking/email multiple times for clarification. The only grades are discussions that somewhat relate to the topic, but they require no reading to complete. Don't take her if you want to actually learn about the subject.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: I was excited about this class, but I was very disappointed. the class was easy but I didn't learn anything. we are 100% done with class. No grades are in. we were given no content or direction. I'm not even totally sure what I was supposed to learn. i thought this class would be the one where i learn how to teach art. but I learned very little

She was sometimes hard to contact but once she answered back, she was always super caring and always helped the best she could. She has several types of projects and some are fun while others are meh. If you are an abstract artist/thinker, you'll be fine. I'm not so I learned to write the meanings of my projects very clearly and I did fine on them.
EASIEST CLASS YOU WILL EVER TAKE! I was so worried but it could have not been more easy. There is like 3 "projects" which are nothing and you have the whole semester to complete everything.
It was an easy class with where you're graded by only a few things and you can tell she's a great teacher passionate about art.
If your looking to boost your gpa, take this class its a easy A!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Participation matters

comment: Amazing professor, most of your grade is in discussions. There is one little essay in the middle of the semester, and one longer essay at the end. She is very helpful and gives great feedback on work. Easy class but she couldn't have been just nice to us cause of the situation we are in with Covid-19. If you need to take an art, take it with her.

This was not supposed to be an online class but was changed to online due to COVID. So - about the only thing professors can do is make you write in discussion posts. We had to do a few papers, which wasn't terrible.
Do the assignments, paper, and discussion post and you should get an A. Great teacher.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Graded by few things

comment: Do the assignments, paper, and discussion post and you should get an A. Recommended !!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Graded by few things

comment: Easy A
Great teacher. Theres only one test throughout the whole semester, fairly easy. Do the assignments, paper, and discussion post and you should get an A.

She does an attendance assignment every class, but after the 1st and only test I never showed up. I still did the work which is a paper, some discussion posts, and some other small assignments. I only went to probably less than 10 classes and didn't miss it at all, was so boring in class. Don't get the textbook either. Very easy, easy grader too.
Great Professor, while she tells you to get a book... its really not required since you only use it once. Its a show up and pass kind of class

I took her as a Freshman. You don't use the textbook. You only take one test the whole semester so STUDY GOOD for it. She is a little confusing when she teaches but she is very nice and understanding. You can tell she loves what she does. She seems super serious at the beginning of the semester but she's actually a sweetheart. I would take her.
Ok, I took this class in the summer time.  Moving at a faster pace, made her even more confusing.  It's not a helpful class, but it is an easy A.

She is the most unclear teacher i have ever had!! I would rather take a harder teacher who is CLEAR on directions and assignments..  she is a very nice person, her tests are easy for the most part, it was just the unorganization, and clarity that was a problem.. have fun
Very unorganized... very unclear. CPS was a waste of time. But it was an easy class.
Teacher was nice. She was flexible if you needed to turn things in late. The CPS responder sucked though. Total waste of money.

Great teacher. Her class is fun and she is full of knowledge. She makes you try out things you have never tried before, like drawing with your eyes closed! Just remember to read the book before the tests.
She is such a nice person. You can tell she loves art and loves to teach. Has a lot of knowledge in the are. Tests are short and you will be ok as long as you read the book.

She's awesome...she makes the course really fun and easy.  Unfortunatley she is paired with Barbara Hammond aka the antichrist.  She was the good part of the FAED course.  Plus, you do a lot of in class art projects that are fun.  Very few assignments.
